resources.string: First of all, thanks for downloading mWeather! I truly hope you like it and find it easy to use, but if you run into any problems or if you wish to criticize/ express your opinion, feel free to send me an email which you can find below. Your feedback means a lot to me and gives me the guidelines on what I should change and update. \n I set mWeather as a challenge to myself since I was pretty new with Android development, I did some other, more simple apps, but nothing like this before. I had no plan, no idea how I was going to do anything, all I knew was that I wanted a cool, simple weather app that me and others would love to use. So this is it- my first attempt to do just that. \n mWeather is open source.

Special thanks also to Zak for designing that cool app icon and all other great stuff.
